definitions.definition: The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.

definitions.example: She has a lot of brains.

definitions.definition: By analogy with a human brain, the part of a machine or computer that performs calculations.
definitions.example: The computer's brain is capable of millions of calculations a second.
I have too much on my brain today.

definitions.definition: To dash out the brains of; to kill by smashing the skull.
To destroy; to put an end to.
To conceive in the mind; to understand.
